column2: ALPHA BLACK COPIES. WE WILL DEFEND THE AIRSTRIP. ALPHA OUT.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. FEET ON THE GROUND. SETTING UP DEFENSES. DO YOU GOT ANY INTEL FOR US. OVER.
ALPHA BLACK TO ALL FORCES. THAT MUST HAVE BEEN LAST OF THE RUSSIAN ASSAULT FORCES. AIRSTRIP SECURE. OVER.
BRAVO BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. BE ADVICED WE HAVE ENEMY FORCES APPROACHING FROM SOUTH WEST. LOOKS LIKE ASSAULT. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO BRAVO. COPY THAT. NEW ORDERS. RETURN TO BASE IMMEDIATELY. DROP OFF ALPHA. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. YOUR NEW ORDERS ARE TO DEFEND THE AIRSTRIP AT ANY COST. DO YOU COPY. OVER.
COPY ALPHA. LOOKS LIKE SOME RADAR BLIPS JUST APPEARED IN THE SCOPE. STAY ALERT FOR SEA AND AIR ATTACK. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. GOOD JOB. I THINK WE ARE DONE FOR TODAY. OVER.
